address-match.required: Tell us if your address is the same as on the letter from the Home Office

email.email: Enter your email in the correct format for example, name@domain.com

date-of-birth.before: The date is in the future

nationality.equal: Please pick a nationality from the list

passport.notUrl: Passport Number must not be a URL

org-help.required: Did you have help completing this form?

rep-name.required: What is the name of the person who helped you complete this form?

org-type.required: Who has helped you fill in this form?

received.required: Have you received a letter from the Home Office?

delivery-date.required: Enter the date of the letter from the Home Office
delivery-date.before: The date is in the future
delivery-date.date: Enter the date in the correct format
